product.name: Eye Shadow
product.brief_description: Max Factor Masterpiece Nude Palette Contouring Eye Shadows, 6.5 g, 1 Cappuccino Nudes
product.p1: Endless look combination, from pale to deep neutral
product.p2: Eight neutral shades for a nude look or a smokey eye
product.p3: The formula gives more pigments and intense colour
product.p4: Buildable, smooth textures: Matte, shimmer and sparkly
product.p5: A dual applicator for blending and precise definition
product.p10: Item dimensions L x W x H 114.1 x 71.1 x 11.1 centimetres
